title: Sewa Hospital - Free Medical Care
description: Providing compassionate healthcare to those in need. Our hospital offers free medical consultations, treatments, and medicines to underprivileged communities, embodying the spirit of selfless service.

title: Langar Seva - Community Kitchen
description: Daily free meals for all, regardless of background. Our langar serves nutritious vegetarian food to thousands, upholding the Sikh tradition of equality and sharing.

title: Vidya Kendra - Education Initiative
description: Empowering children through education. Free schooling, books, and supplies for children from economically disadvantaged families, lighting the path to a brighter future.

title: Shelter Home - Saran Griha
description: Safe shelter and care for the homeless and elderly. Providing dignity, warmth, and support to those who need it most.

title: Water Wells Project
description: Bringing clean water to rural villages. Installing and maintaining water wells to ensure access to safe drinking water for remote communities.

title: Skill Development Program
description: Training and empowerment for youth. Vocational training in tailoring, computer literacy, and handicrafts to promote self-reliance and employment.
